Name: Djago
Review Text: Great Indonesian restaurant. The staff is very friendly and the food was great. The menu is difficult to understand, we decided to have 2x rice tables and the food was good! Loved the taste of all the Indonesian dishes. The portions might be a little to small for sharing with two.

Name: Djago
Review Text: We were lucky enough to get the last table here during a rather rainy day during an exhibition. It's not a fancy place, but the food and service was good, with fair prices. The menu is only in Indonesian, with English "explanations" on a â€¦

Name: Djago
Review Text: Near the RAI ... after PAN Amsterdam  our favourite restaurant . Excellent  service . High relationship  between price quality... I suggest +++

Name: Djago
Review Text: Delicious Indonesian food. Great outdoor seating when the weather cooperates.

Name: Djago

Name: Djago

Name: Djago
Review Text: Mildy overpriced and at best mediocre Indonesian food. The owner is more interested in drinking wine than in his customers. Amsterdam has many excellent Indonesian restaurant. But this is one to better avoid.

Name: Djago
Review Text: Top quality as always especially the spice fish... Fantastic!

Name: Djago
Review Text: We've been coming here for ages and they have never disappointed us. The waiters are always nice and courteous, the owner is extremely nice as well. Before you get to the food you can get some time to take in the atmosphere, which is a busy â€¦

Name: Djago
Review Text:
Food was good, not outstanding. Prices fair, service a bit messy (forgot drinks twice).
Rijsttafel had good variety, but a little explanation wouldn't hurt, so you don't take the spiciest first. Friendly staff.

Name: Djago
Review Text: if you are unfamiliar with indonesion food, you may like this. if you want it fresh, tasty and served in a pleasant setting, go to just about any other indonesian restaurant in area.  listless, near-spoiled, bland and served with utter complacency bordering on rudeness. did i mention overpriced?

Name: Djago
Review Text: the food is excellent and for that it would deserve five stars. However the service is a bit hit and miss; sometimes fine but at times its a trainwreck. Atmosphere and interior is ok but not great.

Name: Djago

Name: Djago

Name: Djago
Review Text: Yes, the food's good, but just wanted to leave a shoutout to the staff! It's really rare to find such good-natured staff in NL, but these guys do it right!
